```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Function to provide a closest match. Used to match HLA Alleles/V genes across mixed output styles.
ClosestMatch2 = function(string, stringVector){
  stringVector[amatch(string, stringVector, maxDist=Inf)]
```

```{r,dpi=300, fig.width = 24}
MUTATIONS = readRDS("OMICRON_EPITOPE_MUTATIONS.rds")
FITNESS_DATA=readRDS(file="LR_IMMUNO_FITNESS_DATA_TRAPP.rds")
SUPERTYPE = fread("HLA_ABC_SUPERTYPES_CLEANED.csv")
NEW_COL=brewer.pal(3, "Set1")
NEW_COL = c("#377EB8","#E41A1C","#4DAF4A")
# Read in DT generated by TITAN. This contains predictions of how many TCRs wuhan vs omicron epitope binds
# Relative TCR specificity = log ratio of number of TCRs binding omicron vs wuhan peptide.
SPECIFICTY_DT_WIDE=readRDS("SPECIFICTY_DT_WIDE_V3_TRAPP.rds")

FITNESS_DATA%>% mutate(pMHC=paste0(Peptide,"_",gsub("HLA-","",Predicted_Binding)))%>%arrange(desc(LR_Immuno))%>%
        left_join(MUTATIONS)%>% filter(Protein == 'surface glycoprotein')%>% left_join(SPECIFICTY_DT_WIDE)%>% distinct()%>% #filter spike, integrate data w/ RTP scores.
        mutate(Relative_TCRSpecificity = ifelse(is.na(Relative_TCRSpecificity), 0, Relative_TCRSpecificity))%>% # label any NA as zero
        mutate(Binder_Grp = paste0("WT_",Binder," MT_",MT_Binder))%>%inner_join(SUPERTYPE %>% dplyr::rename(Predicted_Binding=HLA_Allele))%>%
        select(Peptide, VariantAlignment, Predicted_Binding, LR_Immuno,Relative_TCRSpecificity, Binder_Grp)%>%
        dplyr::rename("HLA Allele"=Predicted_Binding, RI=LR_Immuno,RTP=Relative_TCRSpecificity)%>%
        mutate(RTP=round(RTP,digits=4))%>%
        readr::write_csv(file="/Users/paulbuckley/Nexus365/WIMM CCB - Koohy Group - Documents/Koohy Group/Effect_Mutation_Tcells/V11/SUBMITTED/R_R/Supplementary Datafile/Table4_RI_RTPscores.csv")

# Create BA1 Plot showing average RI scores for each epitope affected by mutation.
LRIMMUNO_PLT= FITNESS_DATA%>% mutate(pMHC=paste0(Peptide,"_",gsub("HLA-","",Predicted_Binding)))%>%arrange(desc(LR_Immuno))%>% left_join(MUTATIONS)%>%
        filter(Protein == 'surface glycoprotein')%>%ungroup()%>% arrange(desc(LR_Immuno))%>%drop_na()%>% distinct()%>%mutate(Binder_Grp = paste0("WT_",Binder," MT_",MT_Binder))%>%
        ggplot(aes(x=reorder(pMHC, -LR_Immuno), y=LR_Immuno, fill=Binder_Grp))+geom_bar(stat="identity")+theme_pubr()+font("x.text",size=10)+rotate_x_text(angle=90)+theme(legend.position = "top")+grids()+xlab("Peptide-MHC")+ scale_fill_manual(values = NEW_COL)+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=16))+theme(legend.title = element_text(size=16))+
       theme(strip.text.x = element_text(size = 16))+
        theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 16))+
        theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 16))


# Plot supplementary Relative TCR promiscuity plot. RTP Scores
REL_SPECIFICITY_PLT=FITNESS_DATA%>% mutate(pMHC=paste0(Peptide,"_",gsub("HLA-","",Predicted_Binding)))%>%arrange(desc(LR_Immuno))%>%
        left_join(MUTATIONS)%>% filter(Protein == 'surface glycoprotein')%>% left_join(SPECIFICTY_DT_WIDE)%>% distinct()%>% #filter spike, integrate data w/ RTP scores.
        mutate(Relative_TCRSpecificity = ifelse(is.na(Relative_TCRSpecificity), 0, Relative_TCRSpecificity))%>% # label any NA as zero
        mutate(Binder_Grp = paste0("WT_",Binder," MT_",MT_Binder))%>%inner_join(SUPERTYPE %>% dplyr::rename(Predicted_Binding=HLA_Allele))%>% # binding change WT<-->MT for color label
        ggplot(aes(x=reorder(pMHC, -LR_Immuno), y=Relative_TCRSpecificity, fill=OmicronPrediction))+geom_bar(stat="identity")+
        theme_pubr(base_size = 16)+font("x.text",size=10)+rotate_x_text(angle=90)+theme(legend.position = "top") +
        scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+grids()+xlab("Peptide-MHC")+ylab("RTP")+
        scale_fill_gradient2(
  low = ("red"),
  mid = "blue",
  high = ("green"),
midpoint = 0.5)+theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 16))+
        theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 16))
```
